description: Breaking so many blocks take entirely too long? Fine, I'll tell you a little trick to break blocks so much quicker. You know that grave symbol ( ` ) in your vision? Well, if you concentrate really hard to press it while you mine, it'll break a lot of blocks! Be weary because it shortens mining time but not free one of food or tool durability costs.
If you don't like this default symbol, you can always change it in your mind. When I first was amalgamated, these buttons were named "keybinds" and this one specifically is called "FTB Ultimine."
